trans-unit.source: Create an access change history report | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create an access change history report | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Generate a report that lists all changes in access to your Azure subscriptions with Role-Based Access Control over the past 90 days.
trans-unit.target: Generate a report that lists all changes in access to your Azure subscriptions with Role-Based Access Control over the past 90 days.

trans-unit.source: Create an access change history report
trans-unit.target: Create an access change history report

trans-unit.source: When you're not the sole owner of your Azure subscriptions, or the resources and resource groups within them, you need to be able to keep track of all access changes.
trans-unit.target: When you're not the sole owner of your Azure subscriptions, or the resources and resource groups within them, you need to be able to keep track of all access changes.

trans-unit.source: Any time someone grants or revokes access within your subscriptions, the changes get logged in Azure events.
trans-unit.target: Any time someone grants or revokes access within your subscriptions, the changes get logged in Azure events.

trans-unit.source: You can create access change history reports to see all changes for the past 90 days.
trans-unit.target: You can create access change history reports to see all changes for the past 90 days.

trans-unit.source: Create a report with Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Create a report with Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: To create an access change history report in PowerShell, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: To create an access change history report in PowerShell, use the following command:

trans-unit.source: You can specify which property of the assignments you want listed, including the following:
trans-unit.target: You can specify which property of the assignments you want listed, including the following:

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Whether access was granted or revoked
trans-unit.target: Whether access was granted or revoked

trans-unit.source: Caller
trans-unit.target: Caller

trans-unit.source: The owner responsible for the access change
trans-unit.target: The owner responsible for the access change

trans-unit.source: Date
trans-unit.target: Date

trans-unit.source: The date and time that access was changed
trans-unit.target: The date and time that access was changed

trans-unit.source: DirectoryName
trans-unit.target: DirectoryName

trans-unit.source: The Azure Active Directory directory
trans-unit.target: The Azure Active Directory directory

trans-unit.source: PrincipalName
trans-unit.target: PrincipalName

trans-unit.source: The name of the user, group, or application
trans-unit.target: The name of the user, group, or application

trans-unit.source: PrincipalType
trans-unit.target: PrincipalType

trans-unit.source: Whether the assignment was for a user, group, or application
trans-unit.target: Whether the assignment was for a user, group, or application

trans-unit.source: RoleId
trans-unit.target: RoleId

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the role that was granted or revoked
trans-unit.target: The GUID of the role that was granted or revoked

trans-unit.source: RoleName
trans-unit.target: RoleName

trans-unit.source: The role that was granted or revoked
trans-unit.target: The role that was granted or revoked

trans-unit.source: ScopeName
trans-unit.target: ScopeName

trans-unit.source: The name of the subscription, resource group, or resource
trans-unit.target: The name of the subscription, resource group, or resource

trans-unit.source: ScopeType
trans-unit.target: ScopeType

trans-unit.source: Whether the assignment was at the subscription, resource group, or resource scope
trans-unit.target: Whether the assignment was at the subscription, resource group, or resource scope

trans-unit.source: SubscriptionId
trans-unit.target: SubscriptionId

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: The GUID of the Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: SubscriptionName
trans-unit.target: SubscriptionName

trans-unit.source: The name of the Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: The name of the Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: This example command lists all access changes in the subscription for the past 7 days:
trans-unit.target: This example command lists all access changes in the subscription for the past 7 days:

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Get-AzureRMAuthorizationChangeLog - screenshot
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Get-AzureRMAuthorizationChangeLog - screenshot

trans-unit.source: Create a report with Azure CLI
trans-unit.target: Create a report with Azure CLI

trans-unit.source: To create an access change history report in the Azure command line interface (CLI), use the following command:
trans-unit.target: To create an access change history report in the Azure command line interface (CLI), use the following command:

trans-unit.source: Export to a spreadsheet
trans-unit.target: Export to a spreadsheet

trans-unit.source: To save the report, or manipulate the data, export the access changes into a .csv file.
trans-unit.target: To save the report, or manipulate the data, export the access changes into a .csv file.

trans-unit.source: You can then view the report in a spreadsheet for review.
trans-unit.target: You can then view the report in a spreadsheet for review.

trans-unit.source: Changelog viewed as spreadsheet - screenshot
trans-unit.target: Changelog viewed as spreadsheet - screenshot
